website_summaries.verdict: A reasonable choice if you want high quality and don't need 20 tools.
pros: Longtime owners praise the set's durability
cons: A bit pricey, considering the set contains only 7 wrenches

customer_reviews.title: Great Set!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as a gift for my husband. He is very picky with his tools, and uses them daily so knowing that when I purchased these I knew they would need to be the best quality, and to my satisfaction they are :). They have worked wonderfully, and my husband was very pleased. We have had them for about 8 months now, and he has put them to the test on multiple jobs. My husband wanted me to put that they are great for getting in smaller spaces. Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: karina haney

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used them much yet but so far I'm impressed. They have a quality feel and the ratchet action feels strong. The closed ends are flat and each side ratchets in the opposite direction of the other.
customer_reviews.author: Some Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Racketting Ratches! Smoly Hokes!
customer_reviews.text: I love these things that make a racket out of my mechanicing! Great for hard to reach places. Now to keep relatives from borrowing them. Into the void!
customer_reviews.author: Pat Wendt

customer_reviews.title: Value
customer_reviews.text: You cant beat the value. Most people don't know, but Stanley makes a lot of other companies tools. These seem, to be ok.
customer_reviews.author: Ogden Carter

customer_reviews.title: Great tools
customer_reviews.text: Stanley, Almost like Mac tools, just a cheaper price. I use them for my car repairs and they hold up better then Craftsman.
customer_reviews.author: MAudio

customer_reviews.title: good for a few uses - after maybe 5 uses ...
customer_reviews.text: good for a few uses - after maybe 5 uses several of the ratcheting sides started getting hard to turn. The 15M wrench ratchet side just stopped working all together. I wouldn't recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Luke R.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty little things
customer_reviews.text: Great quality tools. The rachet side helps a lot. I might need bigger sizes though
customer_reviews.author: senorarturo

customer_reviews.title: Very, very good.
customer_reviews.text: I don't have words to describe how good jt is!
customer_reviews.author: Rafaelle Possenti

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great wrenches but you can put to much pressure on it, just to adjust bolts
customer_reviews.author: Pedro A. Fontanive

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great product, works as advertised, wish they had one 10>12 pieces that went to larger sizes
customer_reviews.author: David R.

customer_reviews.title: Great wrenches
customer_reviews.text: Very solid wrenches. You can tell just by playing with the ratcheting end that they are well built. Zero play in the mechanism. And it takes hardly any movement for the ratchet to work. I bought these specifically for working in tight places in my car, and I think I did as well as possible without spending a ton of money. If you are wondering, these are not reversible, but obviously you can turn it over. I actually prefer this due to the fact that the switch is often easily pushed during regular use with other ratcheting box ends I've used.
customer_reviews.author: JustTrustMe

customer_reviews.title: Great Value and High Quality
customer_reviews.text: I had purchased an $80 matching set of Cobalt Ratcheting Wrenches when I came across these. These seem nearly identical and for about a third of the price. Both sets are made in Taiwan and may very well be from the same manufacturer. After a few short uses, these held up just fine and I returned the Cobalt set and saved a good bit of cash.
customer_reviews.author: Michael R.

customer_reviews.title: Great Wrenches
customer_reviews.text: Awesome wrenches for the price, can't beat them for the price. They are study and fit well in the hand. Wish that they were more clicks, would make them a bit better in small spaces.
customer_reviews.author: Derrick Tackett

customer_reviews.title: Works well.
customer_reviews.text: The wrenches work well, I just wish I had realized they are not offset.
customer_reviews.author: Mark W

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Works just as expected. High quality ratcheting wrenches from stanley. Slim design, well-made, will stand the test of time to be sure. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: PastorBen

customer_reviews.title: Awsome
customer_reviews.text: Great deal on these tool....I have been using them for the past 6 months and haven't failed me...For the price are fantastic
customer_reviews.author: Gus Garcia

customer_reviews.title: They work as intended
customer_reviews.text: Not bad for the price. They work as intended, but the ratchet side is plastic. It seems to be a fairly tough plastic but I wouldn't try putting much torque on it. After many uses all the wrenches are still like new condition
customer_reviews.author: Sean S

customer_reviews.title: BETTER THAN SOCKETS - AT TIMES
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised when these quality wrenches arrived. The set comes in a sturdy, compact storage rack, 11"H X 5 1/2'W X 2"D, with an open top which can be hung on the wall or carried in a tool bag without the wrenches falling loose. SEE: IMAGE The wrenches snap in and out of the storage rack with a twist. They have a lifetime warranty and are made in Taiwan. Sockets are nice but the little devils can find places to hide that wrenches can't. Wrenches are not likely to get accidentally left in a pocket to go through the washing machine and upset the household.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry H. Bond

customer_reviews.title: the best
customer_reviews.text: these are the best tools to use in tight places where rachets and sockets don't fit.I would recommend these to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Howard May

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great set of wrenches. So far, great ratcheting and quality wrench.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: Stnaley Ratcheting Wrenches Excel
customer_reviews.text: Stanley Tools provides a well made, durable set of ratcheting wrenches at an affordable price. This makes them ideal for a wide variety of users.
customer_reviews.author: Steven A Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Love these - use them every time I'm wrenching. I often get confused with which way is tighten or loosen, but I just check with my fingers and flip the wrench over if need be. Another set i have has a switch on the side to change from tighten/loosen, but several of those are giving me problems after a year or so. Pleased with the value of these though.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: ok I guess
customer_reviews.text: They do work however they are made cheep . Ok for the at home joe toolbox but they do have a rough racheting feel to them compared to my snap on set we will see how they hold up
customer_reviews.author: G Craig

customer_reviews.title: metric ratcheting wrench set
customer_reviews.text: This Stanley ratcheting metric wrench set is very handy and versatile in working on my Honda Goldwing. Trusted name in tools
customer_reviews.author: gentlman4u

customer_reviews.title: Best buy for ratcheting wrench set.
customer_reviews.text: Great deal for this ratcheting wrench set. I only needed the 10mm wrench for my project but decided to buy the entire set because of the low cost.
customer_reviews.author: tss_topvalue

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: These work great. I use them for light automotive maintenance and household repairs mainly. I've even run them over two or three times.
customer_reviews.author: dpidduck

customer_reviews.title: Nice price for these
customer_reviews.text: Nice price for these. Use them to change my oil in my car 13mm came in handy. Nice strong tools to get the job done.
customer_reviews.author: calvin jordan

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my husband. He's been a mechanic for 30 years. He uses them all the time!
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Chalut

customer_reviews.title: I wish I would have bought these years ago!
customer_reviews.text: Very handy having an open wrench and ratchet in one. My fingers are getting old, and the more control the better!
customer_reviews.author: M. H. Wright

customer_reviews.title: ... what I need to work on my ATV would recommend this works fantastic I keep them in my ATV ...
customer_reviews.text: Just what I need to work on my ATV would recommend this works fantastic I keep them in my ATV increases I have a problem out in the woods
customer_reviews.author: wilddeer

customer_reviews.title: Great for any handy man
customer_reviews.text: Great for any handy man. I'm giving this to my Dad as a Christmas gift. I know he'll love it. Saves a lot of time. :-)
customer_reviews.author: Bigphal

customer_reviews.title: love them helped me get sway bar end links off ...
customer_reviews.text: I should have ordered these BEFORE I did my Subaru valve covers...love them helped me get sway bar end links off and much more.
customer_reviews.author: SBarn

customer_reviews.title: Nice wrenches
customer_reviews.text: These wrenches work well, good for hobbyist use. Make sure the sizes you need are included in whatever package you buy.
customer_reviews.author: R. Kurtzer

customer_reviews.title: great set for an import vehicle
customer_reviews.text: great set for an import vehicle, I use it often and the racketing function has paid for itself many times
customer_reviews.author: Bill H.

customer_reviews.title: ... needs a set of wrenches and Stanley makes such wonderful products.
customer_reviews.text: Everybody needs a set of wrenches and Stanley makes such wonderful products.
customer_reviews.author: Robbie R. Montgomery

customer_reviews.title: Stanley makes great tools, and I reach for these before sockets.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing wrenches! Like everyone else here, I'm kickin myself for not getting these sooner.
customer_reviews.author: A.C

customer_reviews.title: Wrench Set
customer_reviews.text: Great set of wrench's. I keep them in the tool box in my truck.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen L. Hatfield

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Needed these to do a brake job on my car. The set came in handy. Well Made!
customer_reviews.author: MVJ

customer_reviews.title: like them very much
customer_reviews.text: like them very much ,only down side if there is one it would be nice if they were a bit thinner.
customer_reviews.author: Hank

customer_reviews.title: The best money can buy wrench set.
customer_reviews.text: There are no words to describe these amazing tools. Simply the best. The easiest way to screw or unscrew nuts and bolts.
customer_reviews.author: Manos

customer_reviews.title: Exchange process a breeze
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly, one of the ratcheting pieces was missing and they replaced it very quickly. The return process was simple and quick. Hubby very happy with product thus far.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna B.

customer_reviews.title: Great tools for half the price of lesser brands
customer_reviews.text: Love these wrenches for auto work. Nice solid feel to the tools, highly polished surface with a durable chrome finish. Gear mechanism feels solid and with a fairly short throw between teeth. I haven’t tried to max out the torque on the gears, but they are sturdy enough for most routine applications. I bought the set of these wrenches for about half of what a comparable set at my local auto and home improvement store was asking for a lesser known brand. Very happy with the tools
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

product_meta.title: Stanley 94-543W 7-Piece Ratcheting Wrench Set, Metric
product_meta.description:
Ideal for use with impact sockets. Frameless motor with replaceable brushes for extended tool durability and life. Replaceable brushes.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Stanley wrenches are designed to meet or exceed ANSI specifications. The box end of the Stanley Combination Wrench employs the Max-Drive system, which allows the box end to contact the fastener away from the corner. This system allows 15% more torque to be applied to the fastener and helps reduce fastener rounding. Includes: 9mm,10mm, 11mm, 12mm, 13mm, 14mm, 15mm Ratcheting Wrenches
feature_bullets: Ideal for use with impact sockets
Frameless motor with replaceable brushes for extended tool durability and life
Chrome vanadium steel forging for durability and high torque
Max-Drive design of the box end allows for 15% more torque and helps reduce fastener rounding
15-degree box end offset for additional knuckle clearance
Full polish plating for anti-corrosion protection and easy cleaning

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars109 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
